name: Red Cube!
description:
---GAME!---

Hey guys, thats my first game, (Because its too bad!)

If you like the game, follow me!

---GAME ASSETS!---

I used the Platform Game Assets + Gui https://bayat.itch.io/platform-game-assets

And for the sounds i used BRFX https://www.bfxr.net

The music (Fly) its made by marshmello https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oRArmtMA9AI I love him! OvO

And the music of the end is the... This site -> https://www.melodyloops.com/my-music/longoloops/happy-me/

---WHAT I THOUGHT OF THAT!---

Im liked the game, but needs more levels!

My grade: 8/10
